item.title: Elementary Division Orientation: July 8
item.dc:creator: Kass
item.description: Orientation for Elementary Division students and families will be held on Saturday, July 8, in the Multi-Purpose Room at Washington Elementary School. At the Orientation, you will hear about program procedures, meet your teacher, familiarize yourself with the school, and have a chance to visit with other students. Although not mandatory, attendance at Orientation Day […]

item.title: On and Around the UC Berkeley Campus
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: For students attending ATDP in person at the UC Berkeley, learn about navigating campus, where to study before or after class, and other resources.

item.title: SD Readiness Testing is May 20 for certain courses
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: Enrollment for most SD math students (and a few other courses) is contingent on passing a readiness test. Click through for details, FAQs, and updates!

item.title: Thereâ€™s still time to apply: about our extended deadlines
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: ATDP gladly accepts applications up until the extended deadline for each program: May 26, 2023 for Secondary Division and June 1, 2023 for Elementary Division. Read our tips for late applicants.

item.title: Help support our Pathway Scholars for the BIG GIVE, today only!
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: The Pathway Scholarship is funded by donations during the Big Give! The amount we receive decides the number of scholarships available. Our goal is to fully fund 10 scholarships through donations today. The fundraiser ends at 9pm tonight (Th March 9)!

item.title: Additional course options for SD applicants (Feb 27)
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: The following additions have been made to the Secondary Division catalog and are now open to applications. We have added one new course, back from its pandemic hiatus: Introduction to Biotechnology – New course; TuTh, AM or PM On-site (UC Berkeley campus) · For students completing grades 7 or 8 only. For current middle schoolers […]

item.title: Additional courses for SD applicants (Feb 1)
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: The following additions have been made to the Secondary Division catalog and are now open to applications. Precalculus - Course added Online · Requires completion of Algebra II or Integrated Math III, grade of A in current math class, Teacher Referral Form completed by current math instructor, and passing score on placement test. See math […]

item.title: Additional course sections for SD applicants (Jan 18)
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: The following additions have been made to the Secondary Division catalog and are now open to applications. Computer Science A (AP-aligned) – PM section added Online · Completion of Algebra I or Integrated Math 1 required. Completion of an introductory computer science course recommended. For students who want to master object-oriented programming. Coding experience recommended […]

item.title: Applications open for Summer 2023!
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: If you didn't receive it in your email inbox, check out our latest Community Newsletter which officially kicks off our 2023 application season!

item.title: Updates to the 2023 SD Catalog
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description: For those who become familiar with our courses year after year, or for those who are just curious what’s new, here are the major updates to our SD catalog compared to last year. Links lead to detailed course descriptions. Applied Physics has returned from hiatus! Instructor Kaushik Basu has reimagined this course to make use […]
